home.hero_subtitle: A simple and powerful reference image viewer for digital artists and creatives. Organize your references with ease.
home.feature_image_desc: Import, move, scale, rotate, crop, and flip images with intuitive controls.
home.feature_drawing_desc: Sketch directly on your canvas with pressure-sensitive tablet support.
home.feature_pureref_desc: Import your existing .pur files and migrate seamlessly to BuzzRef.
home.feature_color_desc: Extract colors from any image and copy hex codes instantly.
home.feature_top_desc: Keep your references visible while working in other applications.
home.feature_open_desc: Free and open source under GPL-3.0. Contribute on [GitHub].

features.title: Features
features.image_management_desc: Import images via drag & drop, paste from clipboard, or file browser. Move, scale, rotate, crop, and flip with ease.
features.mass_operations_desc: Scale multiple images to the same dimensions. Arrange images vertically, horizontally, or with optimized spacing.
features.drawing_desc: Press 'D' to enter draw mode. Supports pressure-sensitive tablets with customizable brush size and color.
features.crop_desc: Position your crop area precisely before applying. Perfect for extracting specific portions of images.
features.opacity_desc: Adjust transparency of individual images for better layering and comparison.
features.grayscale_desc: Convert images to grayscale for value studies without modifying the original.
features.color_sampler_desc: Pick colors from any image and copy hex values to your clipboard instantly.
features.text_notes_desc: Add text labels and notes directly on your canvas for better organization.
features.file_formats_desc: Native .bee format with embedded images. Import PureRef .pur files. Export to SVG or PNG.
features.always_on_top_desc: Keep BuzzRef floating above other windows. Optional borderless mode for minimal distraction.
features.screen_capture_desc: Capture portions of your screen directly into BuzzRef with Shift+A.
features.shortcuts_desc: Fully customizable shortcuts for all operations. Display filename with 'F' key.

download.title: Download BuzzRef
download.subtitle: Choose your platform and start organizing your references today.

install.title: Installation
install.subtitle: Get the file for your operating system from the latest release.
install.linux_desc: Download the AppImage file, give it executable rights, then run it.
install.windows_desc: Download and run the executable file. No installation required.
install.macos_desc: Download and open the DMG file. You may need to allow the app in Security settings.

macos.title: Running BuzzRef on macOS
macos.intro: When you first open BuzzRef on macOS, you may see a security warning because the app is from an unidentified developer. Follow these steps to run it:
macos.step1_desc: Click OK to close the initial warning dialog.
macos.step2_desc: Go to Apple menu → System Settings (or System Preferences on older macOS).
macos.step4_desc: Look for a message about BuzzRef being blocked. Click 'Open Anyway'.
macos.step5_desc: Double-click BuzzRef.app again to launch it.
macos.note: This authorization is only required once. After this, BuzzRef will open normally.
